page.title: 11THE CIVIL SERVICE CLUB.
page.content:
The Civil Service representative came on tuesday 25th June 1985 and told us some things:"My name is Mr.Cook and I have come to tell you about my job", he said. Here are some questions we asked him: How many members are there? There are 15,000 members. How much did it cost to build? Â£400,000 When was it opened? 1927 How much does the 'Civil' get? We have gaming machines,which give us Â£ 48,000 The bars give us Â£284,000 The subsciptions give us Â£ 65,000 There is a dance hall,with enough chairs for 250 people
{Cont.}
